special:
The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:
In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
threat: If a user or automated system using ImageMagick were tricked into opening a specially crafted JPEG image, an attacker could exploit this to cause memory consumption, resulting in a denial of service.

If a user or automated system using ImageMagick were tricked into opening a specially crafted PSD image, an attacker could exploit this to cause a denial of service or possibly execute code with the privileges of the user invoking the program.
